author: christopheralanwest
body:
#### PR description:

This PR updates the `HcalChannelQuality` in Run 3 GTs for several channels in HE and HO that were fixed during LS2. The impact of the changes should be negligible.

The GT diffs are as follows:

**2021 design**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/112X_mcRun3_2021_design_v9/112X_mcRun3_2021_design_v10

**2021 realistic**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/112X_mcRun3_2021_realistic_v9/112X_mcRun3_2021_realistic_v10

**2021 cosmics**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/112X_mcRun3_2021cosmics_realistic_deco_v9/112X_mcRun3_2021cosmics_realistic_deco_v10

**2021 heavy ion**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/112X_mcRun3_2021_realistic_HI_v10/112X_mcRun3_2021_realistic_HI_v11

**2023 realistic**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/112X_mcRun3_2023_realistic_v9/112X_mcRun3_2023_realistic_v10

**2024 realistic**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/112X_mcRun3_2024_realistic_v9/112X_mcRun3_2024_realistic_v10

#### PR validation:

The payloads are trivial modifications of the previous payloads. I independently cross-checked the diff of the dump of the payloads. Also, a technical test was performed: `runTheMatrix.py -l limited,12024.0,7.23,159.0,12834.0 --ibeos`

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

This PR is not a backport and should not be backported.
title: Update HCAL channel quality for Run 3
